units.name: Villager
units.description: Gathers wood, food, stone, gold. Builds and repairs buildings. Also repairs ships, siege weapons.

units.name: Trade Cart
units.description: Trade unit used for generating gold at another player's Market.

units.name: Trade Cog
units.description: Used to trade with other players by sea.

units.name: Fishing Ship
units.description: Gathers food from fish and Fish Traps. Builds Fish Traps.

units.name: Transport Ship
units.description: Used to move units across water. Select the units you want to transport, then right-click on the Transport Ship to board them. Use the Unload button to unload units on the shore.

units.name: Monk
units.description: Converts enemy units to your civilization. Heals friendly units (except ships and siege weapons). Can collect Relics and bring them to Monasteries.

units.name: Militia
units.description: All-purpose infantry unit.

units.name: Man-at-Arms
units.description: All-purpose infantry unit.

units.name: Long Swordsman
units.description: All-purpose infantry unit.

units.name: Two-Handed Swordsman
units.description: All-purpose infantry unit.

units.name: Champion
units.description: All-purpose infantry unit.

units.name: Spearman
units.description: Anti-cavalry infantry unit.

units.name: Pikeman
units.description: Anti-cavalry infantry unit.

units.name: Halberdier
units.description: Anti-cavalry infantry unit.

units.name: Eagle Scout
units.description: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Eagle Warrior
units.description: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Elite Eagle Warrior
units.description: Fast infantry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Archer
units.description: Ranged unit.

units.name: Crossbowman
units.description: Ranged unit.

units.name: Arbalester
units.description: Ranged unit.

units.name: Skirmisher
units.description: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range.

units.name: Elite Skirmisher
units.description: Ranged anti-archer unit that cannot attack at close range.

units.name: Hand Cannoneer
units.description: Gunpowder unit with powerful attack, but inaccurate at long range.

units.name: Cavalry Archer
units.description: Fast, with ranged attack. Ideal for hit-and-run attacks.

units.name: Heavy Cavalry Archer
units.description: Fast, with ranged attack. Ideal for hit-and-run attacks.

units.name: Elephant Archer
units.description: Slow and heavy mounted archer.

units.name: Elite Elephant Archer
units.description: Slow and heavy mounted archer.

units.name: Scout Cavalry
units.description: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Light Cavalry
units.description: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Hussar
units.description: Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Winged Hussar
units.description: Unique to Poles and Lithuanians. Fast cavalry for scouting and raiding. Resistant to conversion.

units.name: Knight
units.description: Powerful all-purpose cavalry.

units.name: Cavalier
units.description: Powerful all-purpose cavalry.

units.name: Paladin
units.description: Powerful all-purpose cavalry.

units.name: Camel Rider
units.description: Fast anti-cavalry unit.

units.name: Heavy Camel Rider
units.description: Fast anti-cavalry unit.

units.name: Battle Elephant
units.description: Slow and heavy cavalry.

units.name: Elite Battle Elephant
units.description: Slow and heavy cavalry.

units.name: Steppe Lancer
units.description: Light cavalry unit with increased attack range.

units.name: Elite Steppe Lancer
units.description: Light cavalry unit with increased attack range.

units.name: Xolotl Warrior
units.description: Mesoamerican cavalry unit.

units.name: Armored Elephant
units.description: Anti-building cavalry unit. Resistant to most ranged attacks.

units.name: Armored Elephant
units.description: Anti-building cavalry unit. Resistant to most ranged attacks.
ability: Cannot be converted by enemy Monks from distance

units.name: Battering Ram
units.description: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks.
ability: Cannot be converted by enemy Monks from distance.

units.name: Capped Ram
units.description: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks.
ability: Cannot be converted by enemy Monks from distance.

units.name: Siege Ram
units.description: Anti-building siege weapon. Resistant to most ranged attacks.
ability: Cannot be converted by enemy Monks from distance.

units.name: Mangonel
units.description: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.
ability: Fires 5 additional projectiles at once which deal the minimum damage when attacking directly

units.name: Onager
units.description: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.
ability: Fires 7 additional projectiles at once which deal the minimum damage when attacking directly

units.name: Siege Onager
units.description: Ranged siege weapon with area of effect attack, but cannot attack enemies at close range. Strong vs. tight groups of units. Can attack ground.
ability: Fires 9 additional projectiles at once which deal the minimum damage when attacking directly

units.name: Scorpion
units.description: Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.

units.name: Heavy Scorpion
units.description: Anti-unit siege weapon. Fires bolts that pierce multiple units.

units.name: Bombard Cannon
units.description: Siege weapon with long range.

units.name: Trebuchet
units.description: Powerful anti-building siege weapon with long range. Must be packed to move, unpacked to attack. Cannot attack enemies at close range. Can attack ground and destroy trees.
ability: Cannot be converted by enemy Monks from distance

units.name: Petard
units.description: Demolition siege unit armed with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

units.name: Siege Tower
units.description: Quick land transport used to unload units over enemy walls. Resistant to archer attack. Cannot be used by mounted units

units.name: Galley
units.description: All-purpose warship with ranged attack.

units.name: War Galley
units.description: All-purpose warship with ranged attack.

units.name: Galleon
units.description: All-purpose warship with ranged attack.

units.name: Fire Galley
units.description: Warship that spews fire at close range.

units.name: Fire Ship
units.description: Warship that spews fire at close range.

units.name: Fast Fire Ship
units.description: Warship that spews fire at close range.

units.name: Demolition Raft
units.description: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

units.name: Demolition Ship
units.description: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

units.name: Heavy Demolition Ship
units.description: Filled with explosives. Self-destructs when used.

units.name: Cannon Galleon
units.description: Anti-building siege warship with long range, but cannot attack enemies at close range.

units.name: Elite Cannon Galleon
units.description: Anti-building siege warship with long range, but cannot attack enemies at close range.
